title: [D4] Supp main, lft
body:
I'm an enchanter/mage support main looking for a team to head into the new season with. Able to play supportive junglers exceptionally well. All i need is a carry or two to make immortal. 

Very experienced with itemization, counters and off-meta specific counters. Analysis of enemy composition is what i do - countering it with flex/tech picks is how i win (or heavily counter) solo queue.

Bored of solo queue meta, just want to team up and win-win-win - HELL i'll even join a tourney if i can.

I've got an entire year with nothing but free time. Easiest way to contact me is through the client - will read forums posts tomorrow., ign **_Roasaelion_**
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=roasaelion

replies.body: Hey there man, add me so we can have a game i am also an ADC main

Hey man,although iam only silver5,I do think iam a really good adc.
I will add you and i think you will be pleased with how i play.
A few normal games willl show you
:D
